reporting_cycle: The Panel of Experts to provide a midterm report to the Council through the Committee by 1 June 2010 and a final report by 20 December 2010
summary:
Requests the Secretary-General to reappoint the Panel of Experts and make necessary arrangements (para 10)

Calls upon States and the Government of Liberia to cooperate with the Panel of Experts (para 11)

Reiterates importance of UNMIL's assistance to the Government of Liberia, the Committee, and the Panel of Experts (para 12)

Urges the Government of Liberia to implement Kimberley Process review team recommendations (para 13)

Encourages Kimberley Process to cooperate with the Panel of Experts (para 14)

Decides to remain actively seized of the matter (para 15)
